eu_ES_euro {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u20AC",
            "EUR ",
            ",",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "EEEE, yyyyko MMMMren dda  z",
            "EEEE, yyyyko MMMMren dda hh:mm:ss z",
            "yy-MMMM-dd",
            "yy-MMMM-dd",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "iga",
            "leh",
            "art",
            "azk",
            "teg",
            "tir",
            "lar",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "igandea",
            "astelehena",
            "asteartea",
            "asteazkena",
            "osteguna",
            "ostirala",
            "larunbata",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Basque language locale for Spain with Euro" }
        Source { "Free Software Foundation, Inc." }
        Address { "59 Temple Place - Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307, USA" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Basque" }
        Territory { "Spain" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-08-21" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[bBsSyY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[eEnN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "urt",
            "ots",
            "mar",
            "api",
            "mai",
            "eka",
            "uzt",
            "abu",
            "ira",
            "urr",
            "aza",
            "abe",
            "",
    }
    MonthNames { 
            "urtarrila",
            "otsaila",
            "martxoa",
            "apirila",
            "maiatza",
            "ekaina",
            "uztaila",
            "abuztua",
            "iraila",
            "urria",
            "azaroa",
            "abendua",
            "",
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            "",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,#0.##;-#,#0.##",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.#;-\u00A4 #,##0.#",
            "#,#0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "34" }
    }
}
